abstract: Lazard said that it hired Naguib Kheraj as a deputy chairman and senior executive in charge of international operations.
snippet: Lazard said that it hired Naguib Kheraj as a deputy chairman and senior executive in charge of international operations.
lead_paragraph: 2:42 p.m. | Updated Lazard said on Wednesday that it has hired Naguib Kheraj, the former chief executive of JPMorgan Cazenove, as a deputy chairman and a senior member of its financial advisory team.
